been voted the city with the dirtiest hotels . the hoteliers in tokyo come out very well in comparison with other large cities in an international survey . guests in warsaw could also eat their food from the floor . brazil however scored an own goal : the world cup was an excellent opportunity for the hotels in brazil to improve their image . however the whole uproar about the world cup seems to have left little time or energy for a ` clean-up ' . in comparison with the previous football-free year the scores for cleanliness and hygiene were considerably lower in rio -lrb- 7.29 -rrb- and in sao paulo -lrb- 7.69 -rrb- . runner up -lrb- but not one to boast about -rrb- : london came in second place for dirtiest hotels . sleep soundly : tokyo was voted as the city with the cleanest hotel rooms worldwide . a glance at the online customer evaluations of european hotels can also help to prevent unpleasant surprises such as in paris -lrb- 7.63 -rrb- . in the uk , sheffield came top with summary: in a survey of six million customers , hotel.info reveals the dirtiest cities .   london came second in the list of dirtiest cities in the world .   tokyo , warsaw and seoul had the cleanest hotels overall .
